gw.plugin.document.impl

Class BaseMailMergeDocumentProductionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.plugin.document.impl.BaseDocumentProductionImpl
      • gw.plugin.document.impl.BaseMailMergeDocumentProductionImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, IDocumentProductionBase, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseExcelDocumentProductionImpl, BaseWordDocumentProductionImpl

    public abstract class BaseMailMergeDocumentProductionImpl
extends BaseDocumentProductionImpl
    Base class for IDocumentProduction implementations which use Microsoft MailMerge to generate documents (mainly Word and Excel).
    Author:
    bjohnson

        Parameters:

      • createDocumentAsynchronously

        public java.lang.String createDocumentAsynchronously(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                            java.util.Map parameters)
        Description copied from interface: IDocumentProductionBase
        Attempt to create a document in an asynchronous manner.
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The template from which to create the document.
        parameters - Any objects which may be required for document creation (for context object values, for example)
        Returns:
        A URL which the user could visit to see the status of the document creation, or null if none exists

      • createDocumentSynchronously

        public DocumentContentsInfo createDocumentSynchronously(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                               java.util.Map parameters)
        Synchronously create a document from the given template descriptor and parameter map. The document parameter may be modified by to set certain fields.
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The template descriptor on which the new document will be based
        parameters - A set of parameters which will be used as inputs to the document generation
        Returns:
        A DocumentContentsInfo which contains the results of the document generation. For Mail Merge documents, this will consist of a Javascript file which, when returned to the client machine, will run to produce the document content.

      • getCreatedDocumentMimeType

        protected abstract java.lang.String getCreatedDocumentMimeType()

      • getScript

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder getScript(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                java.util.Map parameters)
        Get the JavaScript code which will be returned to the browser to perform the actual document creation.
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The templateDescriptor descriptor on which the new document will be based
        parameters - parameters
        Returns:
        A StringBuilder containing a (possibly large) chunk of JavaScript which, when run on the browser, will result in the desired document.

      • processTemplateFile

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder processTemplateFile(java.lang.String strTemplateId,
                                          ILocale locale)
        Read the template contents and encode them as a JavaScript string.
        Parameters:
        strTemplateId - The ID of the template on which the document will be based.
        locale - locale
        Returns:
        A StringBuilder containing the template properly encoded to be rendered as a JavaScript string.

      • processMappingFile

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder processMappingFile(IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                                         java.util.Map parameters)
        Evaluate the template and determine the values of the form fields, and then encode them for rendering as part of the JavaScript result.
        Parameters:
        templateDescriptor - The template on which the document will be based.
        parameters - parameters
        Returns:
        A StringBuilder containing the results of evaluating the values of the form fields contained in the template, suitably encoded to be renderered as a JavaScript string.

      • writeMergeFileToStream

        protected void writeMergeFileToStream(com.guidewire.commons.util.ExposedByteArrayOutputStream writer,
                          IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor,
                          ISymbolTable symbolTable)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Create the contents for the merge file to be returned to the client, and write it to the OutputStream
        Parameters:
        writer - The OutputStream to receive the contents
        templateDescriptor - The template descriptor used to generate the merge file contents
        symbolTable - The script host to be used to generate the form field values
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - exception during I/O

      • loadScript

        protected void loadScript(java.lang.StringBuilder strbTemplateFile,
              java.lang.StringBuilder strbMappingFile,
              IDocumentTemplateDescriptor templateDescriptor)
        Add form field values and other required content into the first StringBuilder.
        Parameters:
        strbTemplateFile - A StringBuilder containing the contents of the template, encoded as a JavaScript string. This is an in/out parameter to save memory and time.
        strbMappingFile - A StringBuilder containing the evaluated form fields values, encoded as a JavaScript string.
        templateDescriptor - The template on which the document will be based.

      • getMergeScriptResourceNames

        protected abstract java.lang.String[] getMergeScriptResourceNames()
        Gets name of resource containing the JavaScript code which is needed to do the actual merge.
        Returns:
        String[] Strings containing the platform name and the names of any scripts which will be returned to the client to perform the merge.

      • makeStringFrom

        protected java.lang.String makeStringFrom(java.lang.Object obj)
        Return the string version of an object, suitable for insertion into the created document. In addition to the superclass operations, properly escapes commas and newlines, which is necessary because a csv format is used to perform the actual merge.
        Overrides:
        makeStringFrom in class BaseDocumentProductionImpl
        Parameters:
        obj - The object whose string representation should be returned
        Returns:
        The appropriate string representation of the object.
